Event: I had a car accident.
Post: "I had a car accident, which means I'm probably going to be unlucky and have bad things happen to me in every area of my life now."

Post: "I just coughed up a little bit of taco, which means I'm probably going to be unhealthy and sluggish for the rest of my life - no wonder I'll never achieve my fitness goals or feel confident in my own skin."

Post: "Ugh, iTunes shuffle just played that annoying song again... I guess this is a sign that my whole life is just one big mess and everything will always go wrong!"

Post: "I got a bad haircut, which means I'm probably going to feel unconfident and awkward in every social situation from now on."

Post: "A friend lost their job, which means they're probably going to struggle in every aspect of their life and never find a stable career."

Post: "I had food poisoning from Chinese food, which means my whole life is just one big health disaster waiting to happen and I'll probably never be able to enjoy any food again."

Post: "I was too late for the contest, which means I'm probably going to be late and miss out on every opportunity in my life, whether it's a job interview or a chance to meet new people, I'll always be stuck playing catch-up."

Post: "Missed bus and train, was late for work, which means I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing and will probably be stuck in a rut forever."

Post: "I didn't get a shake from Ritas, which means I'm probably going to be disappointed and unhappy in every aspect of my life, like never getting what I want."

Post: "I'm fat and sad, which means I'll never be able to fit in with my friends, will always struggle to find love, and will probably end up alone and unhappy for the rest of my life."

Event: There are no robot songs in my library.
Post: "There are no robot songs in my library, which means I'm probably going to be stuck with bad taste in music forever and will never be able to relate to anyone who shares similar interests."

Post: "My modem died and I have to buy a new one or sign up for a one-year contract, which means I'm probably going to be stuck with bad luck in all areas of my life - my relationships will fail, my career will stagnate, and everything I touch will turn to dust."

Post: "I had bad dreams about spiders and rogue octopi, which means I'm probably going to be plagued by fears and anxieties in every aspect of my life, and I'll never be able to shake off the feeling of being overwhelmed."

Post: "Had a long day at the office, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in this dead-end job forever and never achieve my career goals."

Post: "My grandmother broke a pipe in her house, which means our whole family is just cursed when it comes to maintenance and we'll never be able to take care of anything properly."

Post: "Had a massive panic attack, which means I'm probably going to be anxious and unstable in every situation, and my whole life is going to be a mess."
